nodes.text: Knights of the Old Republic Miniatures Preview 4

Knights of the Old Republic Miniatures Preview 4 was a Wizards of the Coast Star Wars Miniatures preview written by Gary M. Sarli and released on July 16, 2008. It previewed the Mandalorian Marauder and Old Republic Guard miniatures from the Knights of the Old Republic set and contained supplementary information for the Saga Edition Roleplaying Game coinciding with the release of the Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide.
